entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, McCreary
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 late this evening then southwest 20 before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
